item.title: 3 Research Papers
item.description: ML Approaches in Cardiac Imaging Information Regarding: Information Extraction from High-Quality imaging data Image and data Analysis Deep Learning Challenges and Future Directions https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/full/10.1161/CIRCIMAGING.117.005614 DEEPCAC Publication Summary: DL system that automatically/accurately predicts cardiovascular events by quantifying coronary calcium presence/extent Dataset Used: FHS, NLST, PROMISE, ROMICAT-II Localization, Heart Segmentation, CC Segmentation, Score Calculation, Statistical Analysis
